title: How to counter Rengar.
body:
Alright, so people seemed to really like this gif when I've put it into some other topic as a comment, so here you go. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

https://media.giphy.com/media/26tPmZOzgGb5KZbvW/giphy.gif

replies.body:
No a cats true weakness is this.
https://media.giphy.com/media/10DqC960LpntYc/giphy.gif
I can't tell if the cat just got spooked, or it just got hit by a shotgun bean bag round wielded by that Zucchini. Either way I never knew cats could fly.

Cats are famously afraid of cucumbers. Something instinctual tells them that it's a snake, and they jump away. It doesn't happen with all cats, but most of them react strongly to it. Bananas work sometimes as well.
It's actually because they don't see it and for cats, their food area is their safe zone. When something magically appears next to their safe area, it's scary to them.

I don't think that's quite accurate. Sometimes things can sneak up on me, just out of straying from expectation. However, make it a spider, and I'll get startled much stronger, despite not having a fear of the creature once settled. Put my car keys there, and I don't think you'll get much out of me.
Are you part cat?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8HGoKN1kjk0

Some video hanging around from one for all where 10 yasuos are ulting/getting ulted and they all zhonyas in the air.

Pretty funny.

Edit: For those who were asking I found this, I feel like I saw a different one that was a lot better but I am sick of searching YouTube, Happy Birthday peeps:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S-Ce6uTcG1M
I've seen some of these! Also you can get some really cool looking "statues" when you're using zhonyas during Riven's animations.
Zhonyas Zac makes my day, same Darius ult.
One of the funniest league things I've seen was when Bard ulted me while I was in mid air with Zac's E.
Been looking around but the clip is eluding me.  Pretty sure it was mixed in with a montage video somewhere.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kba7Ncveg_4
Ulting Nasus dance statue, all the way.

Turn it up with infernal Nasus and hourglass Q the enemy nexus.

Swag points are over 9 thousand.

> Some video hanging around from one for all where 10 yasuos are ulting/getting ulted and they all zhonyas in the air.
> 
> Pretty funny.

Where can I see this?

Haven't been able to find it.  I will let you know if I do come across it again.

Edit: found it but I am on mobile so I will link it later.  I am going to attach it to the original comment by tomorrow.
Can't wait to see it.
It is very windy and golden.

There is a pretty derpy video of a bug where lee could ward hop to a ward right as tp finished and travel back to where he started.  Someone put together a video of lee ks/ganks/insects where he would ward hop across the map and ult someone mid way.

On mobile so I can't link but type "cross map lee sin gank" into youtube and watch the first 3 videos.  

There was a montage that contained those and a few others I think but I forget where I saw it.
I will look around for it.
then darius was right there an got a pentakill

You mean, http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/940/782/a28.gif
**PENTADUNK**
I'm wondering... was this an actual game where everyone bought zhonyas? including zed? Because the first time i saw this i kept looking for the hidden bard but I could not find one.
Eyyy I'm back from the original post of the gif take my upvote again.
I've heard Nidalee counters Rengo.  Something about seduction
I mean...zhonyas has cooldowns eventually
That team coordination...
That Darius is going to apprehend and kill them all when they come out...

you are the only champion on that team that it could be considered trolling to have that zhonyas.

oh well you are also broken enough that you can give up that item slot and still be stronger than anyone else.
Theres a sivir and zed. Please tell me which would not be considered trolling.

> [{quoted}](name=Sp33d Zer0,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Uz7VdE5z,comment-id=00060001,timestamp=2016-06-09T03:56:56.251+0000)
>
> Theres a sivir and zed. Please tell me which would not be considered trolling.

Sivir has ap ratios so its not wasted stats just not slot effective
They were also 5 friends so.... it was clearly coordinated and if you go to the original video they are all in a voice chat together.
can yall stop giving tips on how to counter rengar, i want my freelo
This. is. A. True. Master. Piece.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
ff@20, zhonyas are too much.
if you see the exclamation point signaling rengar is ulting you. you have a couple of sec to activate a knock-up aoe on yourself. ive done it before with vel'koz.
